de.tuberlin.onedrivesdk.common

Class ConcreteOneDriveSDK

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tuberlin.onedrivesdk.common.ConcreteOneDriveSDK
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OneDriveSDK

    public class ConcreteOneDriveSDK
extends java.lang.Object
implements OneDriveSDK
    This class provides the functionality to authenticate to OneDrive and handles the communication.

      • getRefreshToken

        public java.lang.String getRefreshToken()
                                 throws OneDriveException
        Description copied from interface: OneDriveSDK
        Returns the RefreshToken of the Current Session, if any exists and the current session is valid. A refresh token is only generated if @see OneDriveScope.OFFLINE_ACCESS has been requested for this session. WARNING The RefreshToken is equivalent to a user password and should be stored/encrypted similarly.
        Specified by:
        getRefreshToken in interface OneDriveSDK
        Returns:
        Throws:
        OneDriveException
